title: # 412 - Patton Oswalt & ME
description:
Today I sit down with Comedian Patton Oswalt. We talk about nerd culture, Jerry Stiller, getting inspired by sports writing, grief, rejected special names, working with Kevin James on King of Queens, and much more! 

Patton has a brand new special “I Love Everything” streaming right now on Netflix!

This podcast is brought to you by Tiege Hanley. Get started for just $25 when you visit www.tiege.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Whoop. Get 15% off your membership at www.whoop.com by using the promo code “BERT” at checkout

This episode is also brought to you by Bespoke Post. Get 20% off your first monthly box when you sign up at https://bspk.me/34n0yqG and enter the code “BERT” at checkout.

This episode is also brought to you by Omaha Steaks. Visit www.OmahaSteaks.com and type "BERT" in the search bar to shop for Father’s Day today.

This episode is also brought to you by Tushy. Go to hellotushy.com/bertcast to get 10% off your order.

This episode is also brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, and sexual wellness for men. Try hims today and get your first month free. Go to www.forhims.com/bertcast 

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: www.bertbertbert.com
